title: Login page crashing on mobile
description: Users are unable to log in using the mobile app properly. It crashes immediately after clicking the submit button.

title: Payment gateway timeout
description: Bkash payment is taking too long to process and eventually timing out for several users.

title: Update profile picture issue
description: Uploading images larger than 2MB throws an unknown error instead of a validation message.

title: Dark mode text readability
description: In dark mode, the text color on the dashboard is too dark, making it hard to read.

title: Password reset email not received
description: Customers are complaining that they are not receiving the OTP for password reset.

title: Add export to PDF feature
description: Client requested a feature to export the monthly report as a PDF file.

title: Broken link in footer
description: The 'Contact Us' link in the website footer leads to a 404 page.

title: Slow dashboard loading
description: The analytics dashboard takes more than 10 seconds to load data.

title: Typo in landing page
description: Spelling mistake in the main hero section headline.

title: API response error 500
description: The user details API is returning Internal Server Error occasionally.

title: Search filter not working
description: Filtering products by price range is showing incorrect results.

title: Mobile responsive navbar
description: Hamburger menu does not open on iPhone 12 devices.

title: Change button color
description: Client wants the 'Buy Now' button to be green instead of blue.

title: User session expires too fast
description: Users are being logged out automatically after only 5 minutes of inactivity.
